t: Amazon's new Ocelot chip brings us closer to building a practical quantum computer
s: You can also read a more technical ... on the Amazon Science website. One of the biggest challenges with quantum computers is that they’re incredibly sensitive to the smallest changes, or ‘noise’ in their environment. Vibrations, heat, electromagnetic interference from cell phones and Wi-Fi networks, or even cosmic rays and radiation from outer space, can all knock qubits out of their quantum state, causing errors in the quantum computation being performed...
